✔️ Project Guides– General project information (e.g., purpose, vision).✔️ Track Guides– Track-specific details (e.g., mic setup, mixing goals).✔️ Version Guides– Notes on changes between versions.

📌 Mix– A combined audio track made from multiple stems mixed together. 📌 Stems– Individual audio elements of a mix (e.g., vocals, drums, bass, synths). 📌 Virtual Mix– A mix automatically generated by Silver Audio when stems are uploaded without a user-defined mix.📌 Project– A collection of tracks, such as an album, audiobook, or podcast season.📌 Track– An individual song, audiobook chapter, or podcast episode within a project.📌 Version– A specific iteration of a track (e.g., “Rough Mix,” “Final Master,” “V2”).📌 Timestamped Comment– A note attached to a specific time in an audio file for precise feedback.📌 Owner– The highest permission level in a project; can add, edit, delete, and share content.📌 Collaborator– A user with permissions to comment and interact with content but without full project control.📌 Viewer– A user with read-only access to a project.📌 Track Guide– A section where users provide specific notes or instructions for a track (e.g., mixing goals, microphone setup).📌 Version Guide– A section that describes the differences or updates between versions of a track.📌 Mix Guide– A feature that allows users to direct collaborators toward specific aspects of a mix that need attention.
